CONCLUSION
The Layer 2 wars in 2025 are shaping the future of Ethereum.
It‚Äôs not just about speed and fees it‚Äôs about who can build a sticky ecosystem,onboard the masses,and scale Ethereum‚Äôs vision.
THE TOP L2s?
Arbitrum,Optimism,Base,zkSync,Starknet  each winning in its own way

WHO‚ÄôS LEADING THE L2 RACE?

In terms of TVL and user activity, here‚Äôs the general leaderboard (as of mid 2025):

1. Arbitrum ‚Äì Dominates DeFi

2. Optimism + Base ‚Äì Scaling fast, strong partnerships

3. zkSync & Starknet ‚Äì Technologically advanced, growing slower

4. ZKSYNC ERA

Why it's notable:

One of the first zk rollups with full smart contract support

Strong narrative around zero-knowledge proofs (zk)

Challenges: Lower adoption compared to Optimistic rollups so far

WHAT ARE THE ‚ÄúLAYER 2 WARS‚Äù?

This refers to the competition between different Ethereum L2s (like Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, zkSync, Starknet, etc.) to:

Attract more users 

Host more apps and developers 

Capture more liquidity

Win ecosystem dominance
